mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user (username, `password`, salt, real_name, gender, phone_number, email, pwd_update_time, file_id, remark, isvalid, ctime, creater, mtime, updater) VALUES (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{fileId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1, now(), #{creater,jdbcType=BIGINT}, now(), #{updater,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, salt, real_name AS realname, gender, phone_number AS phonenumber, email, last_login_time AS lastlogintime, pwd_update_time AS pwdupdatetime, file_id AS fileid, is_locked AS islocked, remark, isvalid, ctime, creater, mtime, updater FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username} AND isvalid = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user SET mtime = now(), last_login_time = now() WHERE isvalid = 1 AND id = #{id}
